Title: Rose's Scabbard
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Raven Molisee, Paul Villeco, Rebecca Sugar, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Dee Bradley Baker, Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle
Plot: Pearl becomes emotionally confused between Steven and Lion when they discover the scabbard to Rose's lost sword.
